name: Shell Runner - Prelude
description:
WISHLIST THE FULL GAME NOW!

Shell Runner - Prelude is the demo version of Shell Runner.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2622280/Shell_Runner/

In the year 2054, the line between man and machine has never been thinner. Governments have crumbled, and mega-corporations control the fractured remnants of civilization. You are a Shell Runner, a mercenary of the digital underworld, commissioned to do the jobs that no one else can—or will—do.

Shell Runner - Prelude is a PvE Extraction Top-Down Looter-Shooter set in a cyberpunk dystopian future. Your objective is as clear as it's dangerous: infiltrate, assassinate, loot, and extract without dying. Or fail, and lose everything.





Fast-Paced Tactical Combat
Deploy strategy and quick reflexes to engage in frenetic battles. Choose from a variety of weapons and gadgets to dismantle anyone standing between you and your target.

High Risk, High Reward
The stakes are monumental. Each mission you embark on risks all the equipment and loot you’ve gathered. Death isn't just a small setback—it’s a total reset!



Silicon Economy
In this world, the currency is called Silicon. Complete missions to earn Silicon to buy new gear, Shells, or intel that could make your next mission a bit less suicidal. Start as a lowly Shell Runner with minimal stats and capabilities. Earn your way up to inhabit increasingly more powerful or even military grade Shells with enhanced abilities and firepower.

Rags to Riches
Begin your journey armed with nothing more than a simple pistol and a few bullets. As you accumulate Silicon and complete missions, you’ll unlock a powerful arsenal of weapons and abilities.

Gear Customization & aRPG-lite Elements
Each piece of equipment comes with unique modifications that impact your overall stats, offering endless possibilities to fine-tune your Shell Runner's build. From the damage output of your weapons to magazine size and fire rate, every stat is customizable. Hunt for the perfect gear and create your ideal build in a world where adaptability is the key to survival.



Procedural Levels, Infinite Possibilities
Experience fresh challenges with each mission thanks to procedurally generated levels. No two hits will ever be the same.

Single-player and Co-op Gameplay
Whether you're a lone wolf or believe in strength in numbers, Shell Runner accommodates both single-player and co-op gameplay. Team up with friends for added firepower and strategies.

You can access this feature by opening the inventory.
